revision.text:
{{short description|2016 Bangladeshi film}} {{Infobox film | name = Dhumketu | image = | image_size = | director = Shafique Hasan | producer = Munir Reja | writer = Munir Reja | starring = {{ubl|[[Shakib Khan]]|[[Pori Moni]]|[[Tanha Tasnia]]|[[Amit Hasan]]|[[Parveen Sultana Diti]]|[[Aliraj]]|[[Rebeka]] }} | music = Ahmed Humayun | studio = Munni Production | distributor = Munni Production | released = {{Film date|2016|12|09}} | budget = | gross = | runtime = 129 minutes<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.thedailystar.net/showbiz/movie-review/bangla/dhumketu-1344898|title=Dhumketu|language=bn|website=The Daily Star|date=14 January 2017|access-date=12 January 2020}}</ref> | country = Bangladesh | language = Bengali }} '''''Dhumketu''''' ({{trans|The Comet}}) is a 2016 Bangladeshi romantic drama film. The directed by Shafique Hasan and produced, screenplay, story and dialogue by Munir Reza under the banner of Munni Production. It feature [[Shakib Khan]] and [[Pori Moni]] played in lead roles and [[Tanha Tasnia]], [[Ali Raj]], [[Amit Hasan]], [[Parveen Sultana Diti]] and [[Rebeka]] played supporting roles in the film.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.bd-pratidin.com/entertainment/2018/10/12/367621|title=ফের প্রেক্ষাগৃহে শাকিব-পরীর ধূমকেতু {{!}} বাংলাদেশ প্রতিদিন|website=Bangladesh Pratidin|language=bn|access-date=2020-01-12}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://risingbd.com/পরিমনি’র_বাড়িতে_শাকিব_খান/54983|title=পরিমনি’র বাড়িতে শাকিব খান|date=2014-06-24|website=risingbd.com|access-date=2020-01-12}}</ref>
== Cast == * [[Shakib Khan]] - Shaon * [[Pori Moni]] - Rukh Moni * [[Amit Hasan]] * [[Tanha Tasnia]] * [[Parveen Sultana Diti]] * [[Ali Raj]] * [[Rebeka]] * [[Shiba Shanu]] * Nazneen Akter Happy - Item Number, special appearance in the song of "Majhe Majhe Ashi"<ref>{{cite web|url=https://m.priyo.com/i/%E0%A6%8F%E0%A6%AC%E0%A6%BE%E0%A6%B0-%E0%A6%B9%E0%A6%9F-%E0%A6%86%E0%A6%87%E0%A6%9F%E0%A7%87%E0%A6%AE-%E0%A6%97%E0%A6%BE%E0%A6%A8%E0%A7%87-%E0%A6%9D%E0%A7%9C-%E0%A6%A4%E0%A7%81%E0%A6%B2%E0%A6%AC%E0%A7%87%E0%A6%A8-%E0%A6%B9%E0%A7%8D%E0%A6%AF%E0%A6%BE%E0%A6%AA%E0%A7%80|title=এবার হট আইটেম গানে ঝড় তুলবেন হ্যাপী|website=Priyo.com|language=bn|access-date=2020-01-12}}</ref>
== Promotion == The first look teaser of the film was released on Live Technologies's [[YouTube]] on January 9, 2016. After that the second teaser of the released on November 30, 2016. The film got an uncut certificate from the [[Bangladesh Film Censor Board]] on November 15, 2016.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.anandabazar.com/entertainment/bangladesh-movie-dhumketu-teaser-viral-in-youtube-dgtl-1.285743|title=শাকিব-পরির হট বেড সিন ভাইরাল!|last=|website=Anandabazar Patrika|language=bn|access-date=2020-01-12}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://bangla.bdnews24.com/glitz/article1088735.bdnews|title=ভাইরাল হয়ে গেছে শাকিব-পরীর ‘ধূমকেতু'র টিজার|last=|first=|date=14 January 2016|website=BD News24|language=bn|archive-url=|archive-date=|url-status=live|access-date=2020-01-12}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.somoynews.tv/pages/details/42526|title='ধূমকেতু'র টিজার: শাকিব-পরীর বিতর্কিত দৃশ্য নিয়ে থামছে না সমালোচনা (ভিডিও)|last=web@somoynews.tv|website=Somoy News TV|language=bn|access-date=2020-01-12}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.jagonews24.com/entertainment/news/74088|title=প্রকাশ হলো শাকিব-পরীর চুমুর ভিডিও|website=jagonews24.com|language=bn|access-date=2020-01-12}}</ref>
== Soundtrack == {{empty section|date=March 2020}}
== Release == The film was released on December 9, 2016.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://en.samakal.com/entertainment/article/16119843/Dhumketu-featuring-Shakib-Pori-to-hit-cinemas-Dec-9|title=Dhumketu featuring Shakib-Pori to hot cinemas Dec 9|last=|first=|date=|website=Samakal|archive-url=|archive-date=|url-status=live|access-date=12 January 2020}}</ref>
